html:
July 26 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Antofagasta, Britvic and Hapag Lloyd AG, on Monday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Antofagasta ANTO.L: Peel Hunt raises to add from hold

* Britvic Plc BVIC.L: Jefferies cuts to hold from buy

* Coca Cola HBC CCH.L: Jefferies cuts to hold from buy

* Hapag Lloyd AG HLAG.DE: HSBC cuts to hold from buy

* Uniper SE UN01.DE: Bernstein raises to market-perform from underperform


Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Monday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.


* A.P. Moller-Maersk MAERSKb.CO: HSBC raises target price to DKK 23,000 from DKK 22,500

* ABB Ltd ABBN.S: Independent Research raises PT to CHF 34.00 from CHF 31.00; rating hold

* About You Holding AG YOUG.DE: Deutsche Bank initiates coverage with buy rating

* About You Holding AG YOUG.DE: Deutsche Bank initiates coverage with target of EUR 32
